sources.title: Pursuit Of Freedom | Full Movie | Incredible True Story
sources.description:
Pursuit Of Freedom - The real life story of a Ukrainian woman who was separated from her three children and sold into trafficking by Russian gangsters. Defying all odds, she survived to be reunited with her children.
2022.  Stars: Jessica Koloian, Stelio Savante, Robia Scott

metadata.Plot: PULLED FROM DARKNESS is inspired by the real life story of a Ukrainian woman who was abducted in the night by Russian gangsters, torn from her three small children, and sold into trafficking after her husband lost her in a card game. After living in a pitch dark, concrete prison for three years, she grew so ill that her captors dumped her body in the street. She awoke up from a coma in a hospital, where a compassionate nurse befriended her, and joined her in the miraculous search for her missing children.
metadata.Actors: Jessica Koloian, Stelio Savante, Robia Scott
